item.title: Loading up on your employer’s stock is tempting in a bull market. But how much is too much?
item.description: Employees face “double jeopardy” in the stock’s decline portfolio and increased job risk.

item.title: These home buyers are suing one of the biggest mortgage lenders in America. Why you should pay attention.
item.description: A class-action lawsuit against mortgage-lending giant Rocket Companies accuses the company of illegally steering homebuyers toward using their service...

item.title: This top stock picker spotted Nvidia and GLP-1s early — and made over 200%. Here’s what he’s buying now.
item.description: Citrini Research founder James Van Geelen identifies potential big money trends and stakes his claim far ahead of the crowd.

item.title: ‘I’m completely disgusted by the lack of accountability’: I bought a dud mattress — twice. How can I get my money back?
item.description: “I have been living in mattress hell.”

item.title: Medicare is about to start negotiating the prices of these 15 drugs
item.description: The 15 drugs selected for negotiation include Eli Lilly’s breast-cancer drug Verzenio.
